svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 27, 2022" date: "2022-08-27"
* Merge-ready execution client releases, update your nodes : Besu v22.7.1 Erigon
v2022.08.02-alpha Geth v1.10.23 (fix for pruning issue in v1.10.22) Nethermind v1.14.0
* Geth v1.10.23 (fix for pruning issue in v1.10.22)
* Merge-ready consensus client releases: Lighthouse v3.0.0 Lodestar v1.0.0 Nimbus
* ethereum.org Merge announcement : 4x multiplier on Merge vulnerability bounties until
September 8. Up to $1 million for critical bugs Reminder: node operators/stakers must
run an execution and a consensus layer client
* 4x multiplier on Merge vulnerability bounties until September 8. Up to $1 million for
* Somer’s mainnet staking guides: Teku , Lighthouse , Nimbus & Prysm ; migration guide
* Flashbots Protect will be down during the Merge until MEV-boost goes live after ~10
* Merge data analysis & data visualization blog post challenge
* Erigon architectural changes for the Merge
* Sustainability analysis of danksharding on network bandwidth costs
* Data Availability Sampling explainer & open problems
* PoS implementers call video . Notes from Ben Edgington and Christine Kim
* Final regular edition of What’s New in Eth2
* MEV-boost relay monitor code , work in progress
* Graffiti fetch : outputs Beacon chain graffiti since an epoch as CSV
* Coinbase liquid staking token : withdraw Coinbase staked ETH on-chain
* Swell Network (liquid ETH staking) guarded launch controlled by the DAO
* EIP5505 : ERC1155 asset backed NFT extension
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Starbloom Ventures!
Starbloom Ventures is a first round venture fund founded by Evan Van Ness to invest in
We pledge 10% of investing profits to support Ethereum public goods.
* Variable Rate Gradual Dutch Auctions : sell NFTs using a custom schedule
* Chuff (Huff utility contracts): ownable & safe math
* Delegatable Diamond : add Delegatable framework to ERC2535 contracts
* Maurelian’s Solidity sandbox : simple repo to play with Solidity using Foundry
* Setup a PoS devnet (Prysm+Geth) using Docker
* Truffle v5.5.28 : Truffle Dashboard faster + dark mode
* Nethereum v4.8.0 : Host wallet RPC methods, batch RPC, AWS Key Manager external
signer, EIP712 JSON support and ENS unicode
* MEV CFMM arbitrage via convex optimization
* OxPARC zkPairing : proof-of-concept implementation of elliptic curve pairings in
* Paradigm CTF 0xMonaco : resource management PvP racing game using contracts; writeups
of first & second place + (patched) exploit to win in a single turn
* NEAR Rainbow bridge unsuccessfully attacked again , watchdog detected attack &
* Superphiz’s #stakefromhome : home stakers share photos of their setups
* Eric Wall: case for social slashing
* Etherscan token transfer warnings for tokens with poor reputation
* EEA EthTrust security levels specification v1
* VMware Blockchain for Ethereum, SBFT consensus, beta; Infosys vital record management
* Blockchains provide businesses certainty about the future
* Dashboard of big brand NFT revenue , NIKE leads thanks to RTFKT acquisition
* Compound v3 is live, single borrowable asset, collateral won’t earn interest
* Maker & Huntingdon Valley Bank first commercial loan
* Uniswap Foundation to be created after 86 million UNI voted in favor
* Fei Labs proposal to wind down Tribe DAO , disagreement over repayment of hack
* eth.link down : domain due to be released September 5, beware of phishing attempts
* ETH.LIMO DNS over HTTPS resolver for ENS
* Gnosis Chain looking for Head of Bridges , Head of Validators & DevRel Eng .
* Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Pay with one click using 3cities. Questions?
* EFF representing Matthew Green for republishing the Tornado Cash repos on GitHub
* Alexey Pertsev pre-trial detention extended by up to 90 days
* Tether waiting on law enforcement instruction before freezing Tornado Cash addresses
* Coinbase US voter registration portal to support crypto-forward policymakers
* How crypto can resist being captured by centralized actors
* Virgil Griffith in solitary confinement due to lack of space, you can write to him
* Mudge claims Twitter has major security problems
* LastPass portions of source code stolen via compromised developer account
* Hetzner (cloud services) states PoW & PoS against their terms
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow
@evan_van_ness and @abcoathup to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* Aug 28 – Ethereum a New Era (San Francisco)
* Sep 23 - ETH HCMC summit (Ho Chi Minh)
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
